caption: Figure 7: Ablation of loss weights. We report CLIP-T for text alignment, and DreamSim for identity fidelity as it is most similar to human judgments (Fu et al., 2023). For reference, we also present the results of the second-best method in Table 1, highlighting our robustness on loss weights.
description: The chart shows the ablation study of loss weights (Apres and Aattn) on CLIP-T and DreamSim metrics, highlighting MagicTailor's robustness to different loss weight settings.

caption: Figure 7: Ablation of loss weights. We report CLIP-T for text alignment, and DreamSim for identity fidelity as it is most similar to human judgments (Fu et al., 2023). description: The chart displays the ablation study results of loss weights (λattn and λpres) on CLIP-T and DreamSim metrics, highlighting the model's robustness to different weight settings.
